data.name: Ghostkin Capers
data.detailed_description:
Ghostkin Capers is an RPG in which you play as a spooker, helping two boys retrieve what's rightfully theirs. Meet quirky rats, solve puzzles, and use your wits to slowly unravel the lore of the Mansion around which you seemingly reside. The major twist: you're not alone?

features
  • lots of rats
  • lots of horror
  • lots of humor(?)
  • Created by girlfriend & boyfriend duo

data.short_description: Who could possibly spook the spooker? Feign your bravery as you uncover the secrets that lie in the haunted Manor; on an ultimate quest to help two boys.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
